original_text: Shall I cause it to return into his sheath? I will judge thee in the place where thou wast created, in the land of thy nativity.
korean_text: 그러나 칼을 그 칼집에 꽂을지어다 네가 지음을 받은 곳에서, 네가 출생한 땅에서 내가 너를 심판하리로다

sentences.original_text: Shall I cause it to return into his sheath?
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그것을 그 검집으로 돌아가게 하랴?

sentences.original_text: in the place where thou wast created
in the land of thy nativity.
